entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of snow squalls. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
